p: Significant ( p < 0.05) differences were found between the average yields when the two collection periods were considered within the same species, with the exception of C. ladanifer and P. sylvestris. Comparing the yields obtained for the different species, E. globulus is the species with the highest essential oil yield, followed by E. nitens, R. officinalis, J. communis, P. pinaster, P. sylvestris, and finally, C. ladanifer.
